title: Acknowledgments (real estate deeds, powers of attorney)
personalDataVerified: Signer name, date of birth, notary name, notary commission number, document type, acknowledgment statement, notary seal/stamp, acknowledgment date
personalDataVisible: Notary commission status (active/expired/revoked). Link to state notary database (county recorders and title companies, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents forged acknowledgments on critical legal documents. Domain binding verifies notary public is legitimately commissioned by state. Permanent real estate records require verifiable notarizations. Prevents deed fraud and property theft. Notary seal/stamp format suitable for OCR verification. State notary databases enable cryptographic verification of commission status. Critical for real estate transactions where deed fraud costs billions.
